channel.title: Curriculum Vitae - Ian Stahnke
channel.description: Recent content on Curriculum Vitae - Ian Stahnke

item.title: technical
item.description: Recent Technical Skills AWS – well versed in Cloudformation, EC2, VPC, S3, Route53, ECS, Kinesis, Direct Connect, CloudFront, Lambda, API Gateway Containerized application deployment using Kubernetes and ECS DevOps toolsets such as git, docker, docker-compose, Buildkite, Jenkins, Ansible, Puppet General purpose programming in Golang, Bash, Perl, Python and Ruby Web programming in Golang, Javascript, Node.js. Content Management System implementation and administration - Adobe Experience Manager 6.X, Fatwire, Wordpress In-depth experience in web technologies such as Apache Web Server, Squid, Haproxy, Tomcat, JBOSS, AEM, Fatwire Security Management, Vulnerability management, PCI compliance, Openvas, Qualys, PKI management, OpenSSL, PGP Systems Monitoring: Nagios, Prometheus, Graphite, Influxdb Splunk (large distributed deployment) Experience of IP networks, Load balancing (F5), Firewalls (Palo) Experience working in an Agile environment ITIL v3 certified

item.title: employment
item.description: MYOB Australia, Melbourne Senior Devops Engineer Jan 2017 – Present Duties As part of the centralised Devops Platform Enablement team, provide common tools and patterns for deployment of applications and cloud infrastructure. Develop and maintain software solutions that solve common problems for development teams. Support and develop centralised logging solution based on AWS Kinesis, Lambda and Splunk. Support and develop infrastructure and application monitoring using Prometheus, Datadog and NewRelic. Maintain and support managed infrastructure based on Kubernetes in AWS.

item.title: education
